home.hero_subtitle: Support local farmers and enjoy fresh produce directly from farms in your area. Connect with farmers and discover high-quality products grown with care.
home.about_welcome: Welcome to Mollat'arta, where local farms and communities connect. We believe in the power of sustainable agriculture and supporting local farmers who cultivate with care and passion.
home.about_mission: Our mission is to bring fresh, seasonal produce directly from farms to your table, eliminating unnecessary middlemen and creating a transparent food system that benefits both farmers and consumers.
home.about_benefits: By choosing Mollat'arta, you're not just getting the freshest food possible â€“ you're supporting local economies, reducing food miles, and contributing to a more sustainable future.
